alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 5:58AM AKST until January 31 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow occuring, with light freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow mixed with light freezing rain is expected today. Freezing rain should end this evening. Heavier snow is expected tonight and early Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
